mapper.select: SELECT coach.*, team_coach.position FROM coach JOIN team_coach ON coach.id = team_coach.coachid AND teamid = #{teamId}
SELECT coach.*, competitionteam_coach.position FROM coach JOIN competitionteam_coach ON coach.id = competitionteam_coach.coachid AND competitionteamid = #{competitionTeamId}
SELECT coach.*, matchteam_coach.position FROM coach JOIN matchteam_coach ON coach.id = matchteam_coach.coachid AND matchteamid = #{matchTeamId}
